definitions.definition: If a part of your body is numb, you are unable to feel it, usually for a short time:
examples: I was lying in a weird position and my leg went numb.

definitions.definition: not able to feel any emotions or to think clearly, because you are so shocked or frightened, etc.:
examples: When she first heard the news, she was numb with disbelief.

definitions.definition: to make something or someone feel numb:
examples: The extreme cold numbed her face and hands.
